data.name: Model Melissa - Walkthrough
data.detailed_description:
A complete guide to the Model Melissa game, showing how to unlock all content and images.

Guide will be available as a readable .PDF file.

Once installed a folder will appear in the game directory called 'DLC - Walkthrough' with the .pdf walkthough included within.
data.about_the_game:
A complete guide to the Model Melissa game, showing how to unlock all content and images.

Guide will be available as a readable .PDF file.

Once installed a folder will appear in the game directory called 'DLC - Walkthrough' with the .pdf walkthough included within.
data.short_description: A complete guide to the Model Melissa game, showing how to unlock all content and images.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains explicit sexually suggestive images and nudity.
